tool.name: LexicMap Index
tool.command:
echo '$input_genomes' | sed 's/,/\n/g' > fasta_list.tsv && mkdir '$lexicmap_index.extra_files_path' && lexicmap index
--threads "\${GALAXY_SLOTS:-1}"
-X ./fasta_list.tsv -O '$lexicmap_index.extra_files_path' --big-genomes '$lexicmap_big_genomes' --batch-size '$batch_size' --contig-interval '$contig_interval' --kmer '$kmer' --masks '$masks' --max-genome '$max_genome' --min-seq-len '$min_seq_len' --rand-seed '$rand_seed' --seed-in-desert-dist '$seed_in_desert_dist' --seed-max-desert '$seed_max_desert' #if $mask_file --mask-file '$mask_file' #end if

param.label: Batch Size
param.help: Maximum number of genomes in each batch (maximum value: 131072)

param.label: Contig interval
param.help: Length of interval (N's) between contigs in a genome. It can't betoo small (>1000) or some alignments might be fragmented

param.label: Max k-mer size
param.help: Maximum k-mer size. K needs to be >= 32.

param.label: Mask file
param.help: File of custom masks. This flag oversides -k/--kmer, -m/--masks, -s/--rand-seed etc.

param.label: Max genome size
param.help: Maximum genome size. Genomes with any single contig larger than the threshold will be skipped, while fragmented (with many contigs) genomes larger than the threshold will be split into chunks and alignments from these chunks will be merged in "lexicmap search". The value needs to be smaller than the maximum supported genome size: 268435456.

param.label: Max sequence length
param.help: Maximum sequence length to index. The value would be equal to the kmer parameter value for values >= 0.

param.label: Rand seed
param.help: Rand seed for generating random masks.

param.label: Seed in desert dist
param.help: Distance of k-mers to fill deserts.

param.label: Seed max desert
param.help: Maximum length of sketching deserts, or maximum seed distance. Deserts with seed distance larger than this value will be filled by choosing k-mers roughly every --seed-in-desert-dist bases.

data.name: lexicmap_big_genomes
data.label: out file with metrics about skipped genomes
